attributes.title: World Cup ticket sales
attributes.description:
Created on April 14, 2010 by dnklatt on Sourcemap.org:

More than two million tickets have been sold for the 2010 World Cup, but organizers are worried they could end up with empty seats when the matches get underway. Here is a map of who is buying those tickets around the globe.
